sys_ui_macro.description:
The K16 Incident Manager Breadcrumbs UI Macro.
Contents: - Provides an indicator of what the Incident List currently contains. If there is no search => 'All Incidents'. If a search currently exists => 'All Incidents > Incidents with short description that contain foo'. - Selection 'All Incidents' or the '>' removes the current query. - ${SP} Inserts a non breaking space to make the breadcrumbs more readable.
sys_ui_macro.name: breadcrumbs
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
</j:jelly>
